name: Cosmos Hunter
description:
Was bored so I made this thing in a weekend. 

Cosmos Hunter is a cross of Outer Wilds realistic spaceflight and solar system mechanics and Cosmoteer's space combat. Fly across a small solar system with realistic gravity simulation and fight it out with enemy spaceships! Navigate using radar! Utilise your ships features to aid in combat! Avoid crashing into the sun! Complete the missions and beat the game! More features, maps and ships may come later.

Art from OpenGameArt.org and Kenneys game assets
